body: Prerequisites: None; Benefit: Choose one of the following elemental subtypes—air, earth, fire, or water. When summoning a creature with the chosen subtype with a summon spell, increase the duration of that spell by 2 rounds.
name: Elemental Summoner
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Racial Traits/Magical Racial Traits/Standard Traits/Elemental Summoner
